page.title: 10Seismatic Survey in Meltham
page.content: In{June 1985,}some strange vehicles came to our area. They were vehicles owned by the{Saxon Oil company carrying out a{seismatic survey.}Saxon Oil are a French company on loan to the British Government. They had come to see if there was any{oil}or{gas}in {Meltham.}The recording truck was leading then came the vibrator vehicles. The{geophones }pick up the surface waves and that transmits an impulse by a wire which runs to the recording truck. The{geophones}are so sensitive they can pick up footsteps 30 metres away. We will not know the results until{1986.}Will{Meltham}be rich in{oil}and{gas?.
